name: Tailwind Font Ramp (234 Styles)
description:
You can use this as a template for any font system or type.


I have recently started using Tailwind.io. So far I am loving the system but running into some headaches when it comes to text. There are so many options.


To help elevate this pain for me and others I created all font sizes and weights in normal and italic.

Hope it helps!
